attributes.action: to abolish the present system of first past the post to elect the Government of the UK and replace with some form of proportional representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop the undemocratic practise which at present allows a minority of voters being able to elect a government with a large majority , which I believe causes MP's in certain political parties to take the electorate for granted and force through policies which the majority of the voters in the UK do not agree with,thereby making it a far from democratic system to select the Government of the UK,and therefore against the best interests of the vast majority of the British public

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
